events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund due to return for an item that did not meet expectations.
Assigning the refund case to the returns specialist team to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket return. I’m here to assist you with processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the item is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 87654321. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached, and it’s in the original box.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions on how to return the jacket.
The return label has been sent. Please ship the jacket back at your earliest convenience to complete the refund process.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send the jacket back and if the refund process is going smoothly so far.
Yes, I shipped the package yesterday and look forward to seeing the refund on my account soon.
The refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Please contact us if you need further assistance in the future.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on how we managed your refund request.
